meanings.definition: Clonkiest (adjective): most awkward or ungraceful in appearance or movement
meanings.sent1: The elephant's clonkiest dance moves made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent2: She wore the clonkiest shoes to the elegant party.
meanings.sent3: The clonkiest penguin in the group tried to waddle gracefully.
meanings.sent4: His clonkiest attempts at ballet resembled a baby giraffe learning to walk.
meanings.sent5: The clonkiest robot on the dance floor moved with jerky, mechanical motions.

meanings.definition: Clonkiest (adverb): in a manner that is the most awkward or ungraceful
meanings.sent1: He walked clonkiest when wearing flippers on land.
meanings.sent2: The clown danced clonkiest during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The waiter moved clonkiest while balancing a tower of plates.
meanings.sent4: The old car rattled clonkiest down the bumpy road.
meanings.sent5: The robot moved clonkiest when its circuits were malfunctioning.

meanings.definition: Clonkiest (noun): the most awkward or ungraceful thing or person
meanings.sent1: The baby elephant was the clonkiest of all the animals.
meanings.sent2: The clonkiest in the room tripped over their own feet.
meanings.sent3: The clonkiest of the group tried to dance ballet.
meanings.sent4: The clonkiest of the cars in the race struggled to keep up.
meanings.sent5: The clonkiest of the robots kept bumping into walls.
